Introduction

Bipolar disorder is a chronic condition aecting approximately 2.6% o the

global population (1). The disorder's impact on mental health is well-

documented; however, its eects on physical health, particularly weight

management, have only recently gained attention.

Weight Changes in Bipolar Disorder
